name: Ultima Online: Outlands
summary:
Join us in launching the most anticipated Ultima Online server! UO Outlands is a free-to-play shard set in the T2A era with over 3 years of development.

Be among the first to form a guild, place a house, conquer a dungeon, kill one of your fellow adventurers, or master a skill. There is nothing quite like the rush of logging in with hundreds of other players for the first time, all on equal footing.

Outlands features auto-account creation, so simply download our installer, pick your assistant of choice (Razor or Steam) and login! Because Outlands is a highly customized gaming world featuring a brand new map, new monsters, new clothing items, custom hues and more, we have made the installation process as easy as possible.
